tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WindFarms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    wind_speed DECIMAL,
    wind_direction VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE WindFarmLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR(100),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    optimal_for_wind_farm BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE WindFarms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    wind_direction VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE WindFarmLocations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE OptimalLocations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    optimal_for_wind_speed FLOAT,
    optimal_for_wind_direction VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    wind_direction VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE wind_speed_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INTEGER REFERENCES wind_farm_locations(id),
    speed DECIMAL(5, 2),
    direction VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
